segment.source: Select an audio format (Bitstream/PCM) for each HDMI input.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ የ HDMI ግብዓት የድምጽ ቅርጸት (Bitstream/PCM) ይምረጡ።

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Select this when your TV is a stand type and is about 30cm or more away from the wall.
segment.target: ቲቪዎ ቋሚ ዓይነት እና 30ሴሜ ወይም ከወለሉ ራቅ ያሉ ሲሆን ይህንን ይምረጡ።

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Select this when your TV is a stand type and is about 30cm or less away from the wall.
segment.target: ቲቪዎ ቋሚ ዓይነት እና 30ሴሜ ወይም ከወለሉ ትንሽ ራቅ ያሉ ሲሆን ይህንን ይምረጡ።

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Enjoy a clearer sound by reducing the low-pitched tone reflected from the wall.
segment.target: ከግድግዳው የሚንጸባረቀውን ዝቅተኛ ድምጽ በመቀነስ ጥርት ያለ ድምጽ ይደሰቱበት።

notes.note: One of value for TV Installation Type help string.

segment.source: Select this when your TV is a wall-mounted type.
segment.target: የእርስዎ ቲቪ በግድግዳ የተጣበቀ ዓይነት ሲሆን ይህንን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: The gap between the sound volumes of the channel and program is automatically reduced, which helps you watch the program with a consistent volume.
segment.target: ፕሮግራሙን በቀጣይ የድምጽ መጠን ለመመልከት፣ የጣቢያው የድምጽ መጠኖች እና ፕሮግራም ክፍተት በራስሰር ቀንሷል።

notes.note: Value name of White Balance Method

segment.source: HDMI {port1} port support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} ወደብ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል። የወደቡ ፈጣኑ የጨዋታ ምላሽ ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ። ከወደቡ ጋር የተገናኘውን መሳሪያ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ የሚደግፍ ከሆነ፣ የጨዋታው ምርጥ ስእል መመልከት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2} and HDMI {port3} ports support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2} እና የ HDMI {port3} ወደቦች ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል። የወደቡ ፈጣኑ የጨዋታ ምላሽ ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ። ከወደቡ ጋር የተገናኘውን መሳሪያ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ የሚደግፍ ከሆነ፣ የጨዋታው ምርጥ ስእል መመልከት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3} and HDMI {port4} ports support Instant Game Response. You can turn on or off the Instant Game Response of the port. If a device connected to the port also supports the Instant Game Response, you can view the best picture of the game.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2}፣ HDMI {port3} እና የ HDMI {port4} ወደቦች ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል። የወደቡ ፈጣኑ የጨዋታ ምላሽ ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ። ከወደቡ ጋር የተገናኘውን መሳሪያ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ የሚደግፍ ከሆነ፣ የጨዋታው ምርጥ ስእል መመልከት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can set and edit the IP address version to IPv4 or IPv6.
segment.target: የ IP አድራሻ ስሪትን ወደ IPv4 ወይም IPv6 ማዘጋጀት እና አርትዖት ማድረግ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: However, the IPv6 version of the address does not support editing.
segment.target: ይሁንእንጂ፣ የአድራሻውን የ IPv6 ስሪቱን አርትዖትን አይደግፍም።

segment.source: Device Connector allows you to connect and set up various devices on your TV.
segment.target: የመሳሪያ አገናኙ በቲቪዎ ላይ የተለያዩ መሳሪያዎችን ለማገናኘት እና ለማቀናበር ያስችላል።

segment.source: Turn your TV on using your mobile device via Wi-Fi.
segment.target: ሞባይል መሳሪያዎን በ Wi-Fi በኩል በመጠቀም ቲቪዎን ያብሩ።

segment.source: You can control with the app which supports the function in your mobile device.
segment.target: በሞባይል መሳሪያዎ ውስጥ ተግባሩን ከሚደግፈው መተግበሪያ መቆጣጠር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Turn your TV on using your mobile device via Bluetooth.
segment.target: ሞባይል ስልክዎን በ Bluetooth በኩል በመጠቀም ቲቪዎን ያብሩ።

segment.source: You can delete the device connection history of Screen Share.
segment.target: የ Screen Share የመሳሪያው ግንኙነት ታሪክን መሰረዝ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can see the information about devices connected to HDMI ports and adjust the related settings.
segment.target: ወደ HDMI ወደቦች የተገናኙ መሳሪያዎችን መረጃ ማየት እና የተያያዙ ቅንብሮችን ማስተካከል ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can set up a device that supports the voice recognition function and is connected to your TV.
segment.target: የድምጽ መለየት ተግባርን የሚደግፍ እና ወደ ቲቪዎ የተገናኘ መሳሪያ ማቀናበር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: It provides the optimal Virtual 5.1 surround for the watching content by an algorithm learned via a deep learning technique.
segment.target: በጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም ይዘትን ለመመልከት ልከኛ ምናባዊ 5.1 አካባቢ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: Turn on this function to connect an external audio device, which supports the eARC, to the eARC.
segment.target: የ eARC ወደ eARC የሚደግፍ ወደ ውጫዊ የድምጽ መሳሪያ ለማገናኘት ይህንን ተግባር ያብሩ።

notes.note: Color Gamut 설정값으로 자동->자동 선택으로 변경

segment.source: Select a caption type for analog broadcasts.
segment.target: ለአናሎግ ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሁፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select a caption type for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: ለዲጂታል ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሁፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select a caption type for HD broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ HD ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሑፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select a caption size, color, transparency, and other options for HD broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ HD ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሁፍ ትልቀት፣ ቀለም፣ ብርሀን የማስተላለፍ ችሎታን እና ሌሎች አማራጮችን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select a caption type for UHD broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ UHD ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሑፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Supported functions and operations may vary according to the model and the current status.
segment.target: የተደገፉ ተጋብሮች እና ክወናዎች በሞዴሉ እና የአሁኑ አቋም መስረት ሊለያይ ይችላል።

segment.source: Captions are only displayed when provided by the broadcast program.
segment.target: የመግለጫ ጽሁፎች የሚታዩት በስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ ሲቀርቡ ብቻ ነው።

segment.source: This function works only when provided by the broadcast program.
segment.target: ይህ ተግባር የሚሰራው በስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ ሲቀርቡ ብቻ ነው።

segment.source: Subtitles are only displayed when provided by the broadcast program.
segment.target: ንኡስርእሶች በስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ የሚታዩት በሚቀርቡበት ጊዜ ብቻ ነው።

segment.source: You can select the audio properties to listen to the broadcast in the way you like.
segment.target: ስርጭቱን እርስዎ በፈለጉት መንገድ ለማዳመጥ የድምጽ ባህሪያትን መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: If the program doesn't support different audio settings, the default audio will be selected.
segment.target: ፕሮግራሙ የተለየ የድምጽ ቅንብሮችን የማይደግፍ ከሆነ፣ ነባሪ ድምጽ ይመረጣል።

segment.source: If you turn this feature on, the HbbTV Distinctive ID of the TV will provide to the broadcaster’s HbbTV service.
segment.target: ይህንን ባህሪ ካበሩት፣ የቲቪው የ HbbTV የተለየ መታወቂያ የአሰራጮች የ HbbTV አገልግሎት ያቀርባል።

segment.source: The HbbTV Distinctive ID is a unique value used only for HbbTV, which is unrelated to the user’s personal information.
segment.target: የ HbbTV የተለየ መታወቂያ ለተጠቃሚው ግላዊ መረጃ ያልተዛመደ፣ ለ HbbTV ብቻ ጥቅም ላይ የሚውል ልዩ እሴት ነው።

segment.source: Please note that LG does not use or manage the value.
segment.target: እባክዎ ያስታውሱ LG እሴቱን መጠቀም ወይም ማስተዳደር አይችልም።
የ HbbTV የተለየ መታወቂያ ዳግም አስጀምር

segment.source: The HbbTV Distinctive ID will be reset.
segment.target: የ HbbTV የተለየ መታወቂያ ዳግም ይጀመራል።

segment.source: Reset the app list approved when connecting to the HbbTV mobile app.
segment.target: የ HbbTV ሞባይል መተግበሪያ ሲያገናኙ የተረጋገጠውን የመተግበሪያ ዝርዝር ዳግም አስጀምር።

segment.source: View Advanced Conditional Access Systems (ACAS) information.
segment.target: የላቀ ሁኔታ መዳረሻ ስርዓቶችን (ACAS) መረጃን ይመልከቱ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-judder and OLED Motion Pro value.
segment.target: የ de-judder እና OLED Motion Pro እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-blur and OLED Motion Pro value.
segment.target: የ de-blur እና OLED Motion Pro እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press the right button to adjust OLED Motion Pro settings.
segment.target: የ OLED Motion Pro ቅንብሮችን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራሩን ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-judder, de-blur and OLED Motion Pro value.
segment.target: የ de-judder፣ de-blur እና OLED Motion Pro እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

segment.source: The optimal resolution for the content will be automatically set by an algorithm learned via a deep learning technique.
segment.target: የይዘቱን ልክ ጥራት በጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም በራስሰር ይዘጋጃል።

segment.source: It reduces jaggies in the picture for a smooth picture.
segment.target: ለልሙጥ ስእል በስእሉ ውስጥ የተቦጫጨረውን ይቀንሳል።

segment.source: You can reset the connection history of devices that are connected via Screen Share.
segment.target: በ Screen Share በኩል የተገናኙ መሳሪያዎች የግንኙነት ታሪክን እንደገና ማስጀመር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The language for the voice recognition will be automatically set the same as the selected menu language.
segment.target: ለድምጽ መለየት ቋንቋው እንደ ተመረጠው የምናሌ ቋንቋ ተመሳሳይ በራስሰር ይዘጋጃል።

segment.source: You can check the voice language next to {icon}.
segment.target: ከ {icon} ቀጥሎ ያለውን የድምጽ ቋንቋ መፈተሽ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can set the specialized functions of {label}.
You can see descriptions for each LG webOS TV function.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ LG webOS TV ተግባር መግለጫዎችን መመልከት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can choose whether to display the home promotion.
segment.target: የመነሻ ለማሳየት ወይም ላለማሳየት መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can receive recommendations based on your content or app use information.
segment.target: በይዘትዎ ወይም የመተግበሪያዎ የአጠቃቀም መረጃ መስረት በማድረግ ምክሮችን መቀበል ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Agree to the terms & conditions to receive more recommendations.
segment.target: ተጨማሪ ምክሮችን ለመቀበል ከውሎች እና ደንቦችን ጋር ይስማሙ።

segment.source: Find and tell an audio device around TV.
segment.target: በቲቪ አካባቢ የድምጽ መሳሪያ ያግኙ እና ይንገሩ።

segment.source: This feature is available on certain devices only.
segment.target: ይህ ባህሪ በአንዳንድ መሳሪያዎች ብቻ ይገኛል።

segment.source: Select the detect range of an audio device.

notes.note: copy strings from connectionwizard by WEBOSLOCAL-6247
HDMI Input Audio Format's help string

segment.source: Please set Dolby Atmos EDID, and select an audio format(Bitstream/PCM) for each HDMI input.
segment.target: እባክዎ Dolby Atmos EDID ያዘጋጁ እና ለእያንዳንዱ የ HDMI ግብአት የድምፅ ቅርጸትን(Bitstream/PCM) ይምረጡ።

segment.source: If you turn on the function, the optimized sound is provided for an audio device supporting Dolby Atmos.
segment.target: ተግባሩን ካበሩት፣ በአግባቡ ጥቅም ላይ የዋለውን ድምፅ Dolby Atmos የሚደግፍ የድምፅ መሳሪያ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: For better TV experience, recommendation of features, apps or contents will be provided based on prior usage.
segment.target: ለበለጠ የቲቪ ተሞክሮ፣ በቅድሚያ አጠቃቀም መሰረት የባህሪያት ምክር፣ መተግበሪያዎች ወይም ይዘቶች ይቀርባሉ።

segment.source: By agreeing to relevant terms, you can receive advanced recommendations.
segment.target: ከተዛማጅ ደንቦች በመስማማት፣ የላቁ ምክሮችን መቀበል ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Please refer to the User Agreements on the Setting menu for further information.
segment.target: እባክዎ ለበለጠ መረጃ በቅንብር ምናሌው ላይ የተጠቃሚ ስምምነቶችን ያጣቅሱ።

segment.source: Enjoy a high-quality sound by wirelessly connecting your TV with WiSA Speakers.
segment.target: ቲቪዎን ከ WiSA ድምጽ ማጉሊያዎች ጋር በሽቦ አልባ በማገናኘት ከፍተኛ-ጥራት ያለው ድምፅ ይደሰቱ።

segment.source: This mode provides a clear and natural sound.
segment.target: ይህን ሁነታ የጠራ እና የተፈጥሮ ድምፅ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: However, to keep your TV in the optimal condition, Always-on will be disabled for the set five hours, and the power will be completely turned off.
segment.target: ይሁንእንጂ፣ ቲቪዎን በጥሩ ሁኔታ ለማስቀጠል፣ Always-on ለ አምስት ሰዓታት ይሰናከላል እና ሃይሉ ጨርሶ ይጠፋል።

segment.source: You can adjust the sound effects when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲበራ ወይም ሲጠፋ እና ማያው ሲንቀሳቀስ የድምጽ ማሳመሪያውን ማስተካከል ይችላሉ።

notes.note: copy strings from store-demo by WEBOSLOCAL-6473

segment.source: If you turn this feature on, you can watch a diverse range of Internet channels. It leads you to consent the collection of television viewing information and personalized advertisement by LG Electronics Inc. ("LGE") and third party service provider.
segment.target: ይህንን ባህሪ ካበሩ፣ የተለያዩ ሰፊ የበይነመረብ ጣቢያዎች መመልከት ይችላሉ። የተሌቪዥን ዕይታ መረጃ ስብስብ እና በ LG Electronics Inc. (”LGE”) እና የሶስተኛ አካል የአገልግሎት አቅራቢ ግላዊነት የተላበሰ ማሳወቂያ ለመስማማት ይመራዎታል።

segment.source: Deep Learning AI Picture is now on.
segment.target: ጥልቅ መማር AI ስእል አሁን በርቷል።

segment.source: Deep Learning AI Picture is now off.
segment.target: ጥልቅ መማር AI ስእል አሁን ጠፍቷል።

segment.source: Deep Learning AI Picture is in progress.
segment.target: ጥልቅ መማር AI ስእል በሂደት ላይ ነው።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-blur and OLED Motion value.
segment.target: የ de-blur እና OLED Motion እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-judder and OLED Motion value.
segment.target: የ de-judder እና OLED Motion እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press right button to adjust de-judder, de-blur and OLED Motion value.
segment.target: የ de-judder፣ de-blur እና OLED Motion እሴትን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራር ይጫኑ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] string about OLED motion pro function

segment.source: Press the right button to adjust OLED Motion settings.
segment.target: የ OLED Motion ቅንብሮችን ለማስተካከል የቀኝ አዝራሩን ይጫኑ።
የ AI ስእል በሂደት ላይ ነው።

segment.source: Adjust peak brightness for the brightest luminance.
Register the TV to LG account to control the TV with the voice recognition of external device.
segment.target: ቲቪውን በውጫዊ መሳሪያ ድምጽ መለየት ለመቆጣጠር ቲቪውን ወደ LG መለያ ይመዝግቡ።

segment.source: Even when the TV is off and using the minimum power, you can listen to music by connecting the mobile device or use the voice recognition.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲጠፋ እና ዝቅተኛ ሃይል በመጠቀም ላይ ቢሆንም እንኳ፣ የሞባይል መሳሪያውን በማገናኘት ወይም የድምጽ መለየትን በመጠቀም ሙዚቃ መስማት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Your TV must stay off while Pixel Refresher process is in progress. Any current or upcoming recordings, reminders, or timer power-on scheduled during this process will be canceled and the BT speaker on Zero View is not available.
segment.target: የፒክሰል አዳሽ ሂደት በሂደት ላይ ሳለ TVዎ እንደተዘጋ መቆየት አለበት። ማናቸውም በዚህ ሂደት ወቅት ጊዜ የተያዘላቸው የአሁን ወይም መጪ ቀረጻዎች፣ አስታዋሾች ወይም ጊዜ ቆጣሪ ማብራቶች ይሰረዛሉ እና የ BT የድምጽ ማጉያ በ ባዶ ዕይታ ላይ አይገኝም።

segment.source: The visual effects is displayed on the screen when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲበራ ወይም ሲጠፋ እና ማያ ገጹ ሲንቀሳቀስ የዕይታ ማሳመሪያዎቹ በማያ ገጹ ላይ ይታያል።

segment.source: When the visual effects is off, the screen is displayed as Live TV.
segment.target: የዕይታ ማሳመራዎች ሲጠፉ፣ ማያ ገጹ እንደ ቀጥታ ቲቪ ይታያል።

segment.source: Even when the TV is off and using the minimum power, you can listen to music by connecting the mobile device. A wealth of features can be used fast again when TV is turned on.
segment.target: ቲቪ ቢጠፋም እና ጥቂት ሃይል በመጠቀም ላይ ቢሆንም እንኳን፣ የሞባይል መሳሪያው በማገናኘት ሙዚቃን ማዳመጥ ይችላሉ። ቲቪ ሲበራ የባህሪያት ሃብት እንደገና በፍጥነት ጥቅም ላይ ሊውል ይችላል።

segment.source: Adjust your pointer's moving speed and size.
segment.target: የአመልካችዎ የእንቅስቃሴ ፍጥነት እና መጠን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: To provide an optimized picture quality, the ULTRA HD Deep Color of the current HDMI port will be changed to 8K.
segment.target: በአግባቡ የተመጠነ የስእል ጥራት ለማቅረብ፣ የአሁኑ የ HDMI ወደብ ULTRA HD Deep Color ወደ 8K ይለወጣል።

segment.source: While applying the settings, picture or sound may not work properly.
segment.target: ቅንብሮቹን በመተግበር ላይ እያሉ ስእል ወይም ድምጽ በአግባቡ ላይሰራ ይችላል።

segment.source: If the issue persists, please revert the settings or reboot your connected external device.
segment.target: ችግሩ ከቀጠለ፣ እባክዎ ቅንብሮቹን ይመልሱ ወይም የተገናኙ ውጫዊ መሳሪያዎን እንደገና ያስጀምሩ።

segment.source: You can select the ULTRA HD Deep Color of Port.
segment.target: ULTRA HD Deep Color ወደብን መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can launch the Instant Game Response by setting HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Color "On".
segment.target: HDMI ULTRA HD Deep Colorን “አብራ” የሚለዉን በመንካት ፈጣን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ማስጀመር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The process will take about {n} minute(s) to complete and your TV needs to remain turned off.
segment.target: ሂደቱን ለማጠናቀቅ {n} ደቂቃ(ዎች) ገደማ የሚወስድ ሲሆን TVዎ እንደጠፋ መቆየት ያስፈልገዋል።

segment.source: If recording or software update is in progress, it will wait until they are completed and the process can take more than {n} minute(s).
segment.target: ቀረጻ ወይም የሶፍትዌር ዝማኔ በሂደት ላይ ካለ፣ እስከሚጠናቀቁ ይቆያል ሂደቱም ከ {n} ደቂቃ(ዎች) በላይ ሊቆይ ይችላል።

segment.source: Select the ULTRA HD Deep Color for HDMI {num} port.
segment.target: ለ HDMI {num} ወደብ የ ULTRA HD Deep Color ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select another Digital Sound Out (Auto or PCM) if you can't hear sound effect after selecting Pass Through.
segment.target: ይለፍ በ ከመረጡ በኋላ የድምጽ ማሳመሪያ መስማት ካልቻሉ፣ ሌላ ዲጂታል ድምጽ ማውጫ (ራስ ሰር ወይም PCM) ይምረጡ።

segment.source: The visual effects is displayed on the screen when the TV is turned on and the screen moves.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲበራ እና ማያ ገጹ ሲንቀሳቀስ የዕይታ ማሳመሪያዎቹ በማያ ገጹ ላይ ይታያሉ።

segment.source: Screen shifts at regular time intervals and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: ማያ ገጹ በመደበኛ የጊዜ ገደብ በመቀያየር ቲቪው ረዘም ላለ ጊዜ በርቶ በመቆየቱ ምክንያት ሊመጡ የሚችሉ የስእል ጥራት ችግሮችን ይከላከሉ።

segment.source: Adjust the luminance of static images such as logos, etc and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: የደረቅ ምስሎችን ነጸብራቅ እንደ ዓርማዎች፣ ወዘተ የመሳሰሉትን በማስተካከል ቲቪው ረዘም ላለ ጊዜ በርቶ በመቆየቱ ምክንያት ሊመጡ የሚችሉ የስእል ጥራት ችግሮችን ይከላከሉ።

segment.source: Guide menus and operations with voice for visually impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: የመመሪያ ምናሌዎች እና ክንውኖች ከድምጽ ጋር ማየት ችግር ላለባቸው ተመልካቾች ቲቪን ለመጠቀም ።

segment.source: Adjust speed, volume and etc in detail after turning on the function.
segment.target: ተግባሩን ካበሩ በኋላ ፍጥነት፣ የድምጽ መጠን እና ወዘተ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust remote's cursor speed and appearance.
segment.target: የሩቅ መቆጣጠሪያዎን ጠቋሚ ፍጥነት እና ዕይታ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust the transparency of some menus such as TV Guide and Search so that the background is visible even when using the menu.
segment.target: ምርጫዎችን ሲጠቀሙ እንኳን በስተጀርባው አንዲታይ እንደ ቲቪ መመሪያ እና ፍለጋ የመሳሰሉ አንዳንድ ምናሌዎችን ግሉጽነት ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: The menu for transparency adjustment may vary depending on the product model and the current status.
segment.target: በምርት ሁነታ እና የአሁኑ አቋም መሰረት ለግሉጽነት ማስተካከል ምናሌው ሊለያይ ይችላል።

segment.source: Describe the content on the screen with voice for visually impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: ማየት ለሚቸግራቸው ተመልካቾች ቲቪ ለመጠቀም ይዘቱን በድምጽ በማያ ገጹ ላይ ይግለጹ።

segment.source: This function works only when it is provided by the broadcast program.
segment.target: ይህ ተግባር የሚሰራው በስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ ሲቀርብ ብቻ ነው።

segment.source: Set additional options for Video Description.
Display captions for hearing-impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: መስማት ለሚቸግራቸው ተመልካቾች ቲቪ ለመጠቀም መግለጫ ጽሑፎችን ያሳዩ።

segment.source: Set the sound to play when the TV is turned on or off.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲበራ ወይም ሲጠፋ ድምጹን ለማጫወት ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Enhance the contrast between bright and dark areas of some menus, such as the background and text, for being easily viewed by those with low-vision.
segment.target: ዝቅተኛ ዕይታ ባላቸው በቀላሉ እንዲታይ እንደ በስተጀርባ እና ጽሑፍ የመሳሰሉ አንዳንድ ምናሌዎችን ንጽጽሩን በብርሃን እና ጭለማ መሃከል ይጨምሩ።

segment.source: Select a caption type for digital broadcasts and set the caption size, color and etc.
segment.target: ለዲጂታል ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሑፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ እና የመግለጫ ጽሑፉ መጠን፣ ቀለም እና ወዘተ ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: View more information about watching program and enjoy related contents.
segment.target: ስለ መመልከቻ ፕሮግራም ተጨማሪ መረጃ ይመልከቱ እና በተዛማጅ ይዘቶች ይደሰቱ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] Do Not Track's helpString in HbbTV

segment.source: The HbbTV application or service will disable its tracking of an individual user.
segment.target: የ HbbTV መተግበሪያ ወይም አገልግሎት የእያንዳንዱ ተጠቃሚ ክትትል ያቦዝናል።

notes.note: [webOS 4.5] Do Not Track's helpString in IBB Service

segment.source: The IBB service will disable its tracking of an individual user.
segment.target: የ IBB አገልግሎት የእያንዳንዱ ተጠቃሚ ክትትል ያቦዝናል።

segment.source: This service provides you with more information about watching program and enjoys related contents.
segment.target: ይህ አገልግሎት ስለ መመልከቻ ፕሮግራም ተጨማሪ መረጃ ያቀርብልዎታል እና ተዛማጅ ይዘቶችን ይደሰቱበታል።

segment.source: Select the audio properties to listen to the broadcast in the way you like.
segment.target: ስርጭቱን እርስዎ በፈለጉት መንገድ ለማዳመጥ የድምጽ ባህሪያትን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Provide HbbTV Distinctive ID to HbbTV service for broadcasts.
segment.target: ለHbbTV አገልግሎት ስርጭት ልዩ መለያ ለ HbbTV ያቅርቡ።

segment.source: Watch a diverse range of Internet contents on TV channels.
segment.target: በቲቪ ጣቢያዎች ላይ የበይነመረብ የተለያዩ ግዛት ይዘቶችን ይመልከቱ።

segment.source: Select audio language for digital broadcasts.
If the program does not support multiple languages, the default language is selected.
segment.target: ፕሮግራሙ ብዙ ቋንቋዎችን የማይደግፍ ከሆነ፣ ነባሩ ቋንቋ ይመረጣል።

segment.source: Consent is required for the collection of television viewing to use the service. Collected information may be provided to LG Electronics Inc. ("LGE") and third party service provider for customized advertising.
segment.target: የተሌቪዥን ዕይታ ስብስቡ አገልግሎቱን ለመጠቀም ስምምነት ይፈለጋል። ለብጁ ማስተዋወቂያ የተሰበሰበ መረጃ ለ LG Electronics Inc. (”LGE”) እና የሶስተኛ ወገን አገልግሎት አቅራቢ ሊቀርብ ይችላል።

segment.source: Inspect the TV status or change the settings.
segment.target: የቲቪ አቋሙን ይከታተሉ ወይም ቅንብሮችን ይለውጡ።

segment.source: * The sound may not output when Digital Sound Out is set to Pass Through.
segment.target: * የዲጂታል ድምጽ ማውጫ ወደ Pass Through በሚዘጋጅበት ጊዜ ድምጹ ወደ ውጭ አይወጣም።

segment.source: Set contents recommendations-related features based on watching history.
segment.target: በመመልከት ታሪክ ላይ መሰረት በማድረግ የይዘቶችን ምክሮች የተዛመዱ ባህሪያትን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: The language for the voice recognition will be automatically set depending on the selected menu language.
segment.target: ለድምጽ መለየት ቋንቋው እንደ ተመረጠው የምናሌ ቋንቋ መሰረት በራሱ ጊዜ ይዘጋጃል።

segment.source: If the selected language does not support, the default language from broadcasts will be used.
segment.target: የተመረጠው ቋንቋ የማይደግፍ ከሆነ፣ ነባሩ ቋንቋ ከስርጭቱ ጥቅም ላይ ይውላል።

segment.source: Select your first choice of audio language for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: ለዲጂታል ስርጭቶች የመጀመሪያ የድምጽ ቋንቋ ምርጫዎን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select your second choice of audio language for digital broadcasts.
segment.target: ለዲጂታል ስርጭቶች ሁለተኛ የድምጽ ቋንቋ ምርጫዎን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Set the region and country for broadcasts and special services.
segment.target: ለስርጭትና ልዩ አገልግሎቶች ክልል እና ሀገር ይወስኑ።

segment.source: Select the residential region for your regional broadcast signal.
segment.target: ለክልላዊ ስርጭት ሲግናልዎ የመኖሪያ ክልሉን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select the country for your country's special services.
Provided services may vary depending on countries.
segment.target: በአገሮች መሰረት የቀረቡ አገልግሎቶች ሊለያዩ ይችላል።

segment.source: Set the time for TV to turn on or off automatically.
segment.target: ቲቪው በራሱ ጊዜ እንዲበራ ወይም እንዲጠፋ ሰዓት ይወስኑ።

segment.source: Set the TV to turn off automatically after a set amount of time.
segment.target: TVው ከተሞላው ሰአት በኋላ በራሱ ጊዜ እንደሚጠፋ ያድርጉት።

segment.source: TV can be used as an alarm.
segment.target: ቲቪው እንደ ማንቂያ ደዉል ጥቅም ላይ ሊውል ይችላል።

segment.source: TV is turned off at a set time on every specified day.
segment.target: ቲቪው በተሞላበት ሰዓት በእያንዳንዱ የተወሰነለት ቀን ይጠፋል።

segment.source: Set the TV to turn off automatically if there is no user input for 2 hours after the TV automatically turns on.
segment.target: ቲቪውን በራሱ ጊዜ ከበራ በኋላ ለ 2 ሰዓታት ምንም የተጠቃሚ ግብአት ከሌለ ቲቪውን በራሱ ጊዜ ለማጥፋት ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Select the channel to watch when the TV turns on.
segment.target: ቲቪውን በሚበራበት ጊዜ የሚጠቀሙበትን ጣብያ ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Set the volume level when the TV turns on.
segment.target: ቲቪው በሚበራበት ጊዜ የድምጽ መጠኑን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Adjust the sound effects when the TV is turned on or off and the screen moves.
segment.target: ቲቪው ሲበራ ወይም ሲጠፋ እና ማያው ሲንቀሳቀስ የድምጽ ማሳመሪያውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: During the Always-on Off Time, part of features like voice recognition and etc are limited when the screen off.
segment.target: በ Always-on Off Time ወቅት፣ ማያ ገጹ ሲጠፋ የድምጽ መለየት እና ወዘተ የመሳሰሉትን ከፊል ባህሪያት ውሱን ናቸው።

segment.source: Recommend setting up the hours you don't usually watch TV to Always-on.
segment.target: ብዙ ጊዜ ቲቪ የማይመለከቱባቸዉን ሰዓታት ወደ Always-on ማቀናበር ይመከራል።

segment.source: You'll be welcomed when you come home based on the registered smartphone information and ambient lighting will be provided when motion is detected around the TV.
segment.target: በተመዘገበው ዘመናዊ ስልክዎ መረጃ መሰረት በማድረግ ወደ ቤት ሲመጡ በደንብ ይቀበልዎታል እና በቲቪው አካባቢ እንቅስቃሴ ሲገኝ የአካባቢ ብርሃን ይቀርባል።

segment.source: Even when the TV is off, you can listen to music by connecting smartphone to the TV via Bluetooth.
segment.target: ቲቪው ቢጠፋ እንኳን፣ ዘመናዊ ስልክዎ በ Bluetooth በኩል ወደ ቲቪ ጋር በማገናኘት ሙዚቃ መስማት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Set your account and check information to use service from LG.
segment.target: ከ LG አገልግሎት ለመጠቀም መለያዎን ያዘጋጁ እና መረጃን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: Turn on/off the related features of energy consumption.
Set the time to turn off the TV automatically without user input.
segment.target: ያለ ተጠቃሚ ግበአት በራሱ ጊዜ ቲቪውን ለማጥፋት ጊዜውን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: When a connected HDD has not been used for a specified amount of time, switch to standby mode to reduce power consumption.
segment.target: የተገናኘው HDD ለተወሰነው የጊዜ መጠን ጥቅም ላይ ካልዋለ ወደ ዝግጁ ሞድ ይቀይሩት።

segment.source: Collect and store MAC address, model number, country code, language settings, and software version to verify the latest software to update.
segment.target: የታደሰ ሶፍትዌር መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ የ MAC አድራሻ፣ የሞዴል ቁጥር፣ የአገር ኮድ፣ የቋንቋ ቅንብሮች እና የሶፍትዌር ስሪትን ሰብስበው ያከማቹ።

segment.source: Adjust animation effect shown on the home at certain times.
segment.target: በተወሰኑ ጊዜያት በመነሻ ገጽ የታየውን የተልወስዋሽ ማሳመሪያ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Receive emergency alerts from TV when an emergency occurs.
segment.target: አስቸኳይ አደጋ ሲከሰት ከቲቪው የአስቸኳይ አደጋ ማስጠንቀቂያዎችን ይድረስዎ።

segment.source: Switch to standby mode to turn the TV back on quickly when you turn off the TV.
segment.target: ቲቪዎን ሲያጠፉ በፍጥነት ቲቪውን መልሰው ለማብራት ወደ ተጠባባቂ ሁነታ ይቀይሩ።

segment.source: Switch to standby mode to use a variety of function like apps, search and etc quickly when you turn off the TV.
segment.target: ቲቪዎን ሲያጠፉ በፍጥነት መተግበሪያዎች፣ ፍለጋ እና ወዘተ የመሳሰለ የተለያየ ተግባርን ለመጠቀም ወደ ተጠባባቂ ሁነታ ይቀይሩ።

segment.source: Energy consumption may increase if this feature is on.
segment.target: ይህ ባህሪ ከበራ የኅይል ፍጆታ ሊጨምር ይችላል።

segment.source: Set collecting cookies or delete the record of cookies to control the advertising frequency.
segment.target: የማስታወቂያ ድግግሞሽን ለመቆጣጠር ኩኪዎችን መሰብሰብ ያዘጋጅ ወይም የኩኪዎችን መዝገብ ይሰርዙ።

segment.source: Track the number of the advertising frequency shown on TV and set the same ads not to show up continuously above a certain level.
segment.target: በቲቪው ላይ የታየውን የማስታወቂያ ድግግሞሽ ቁጥር ይከተሉ እና ተመሳሳይ ማስታወቂያዎች ከተወሰነው ደረጃ በላይ በቀጣይ እንዳይታዩ ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: LG Wireless Keyboard allows you to control TV through Bluetooth.
segment.target: የ LG ሽቦ አልባ የቁልፍ ሰሌዳ ቲቪን በ Bluetooth በኩል ለመቆጣጥር ያስችልዎታል።

segment.source: This feature applies only to specified LG Wireless Keyboard models.
segment.target: ይህ ባህሪ ለተወሰኑ የ LG ሽቦ አልባ የቁልፍ ሰሌዳ ሞዴሎችን ብቻ ይተገበራል።

segment.source: If the static screen has not received any user input for an hour, it will switch to a screen saver.
segment.target: ቋሚ ማያ ገጹ ለሰዓታት የተጠቃሚውን ማንኛውም ግብአት ካልደረሰው ወደ ማያ ገጽ ዕይታ ማቦዘኛ ይቀየራል።

segment.source: If you turn this option off, the static screen may remain longer, which degrade screen quality or hardly recover in some cases.
segment.target: ይህ አማራጭ ካጠፉት፣ የማያ ገጹን ጥራት የሚቀንስ ወይም በአንዳንድ ጉዳዮች ሊመለስ የማይችል የቋሚ ማያ ገጹ ረጅም ይቆያል።

segment.source: * Though this option is set to ON, the screen saver will not work to avoid disturbing your viewing experience on external inputs like Live TV.
segment.target: * ይህ አማራጭ ወደ አብራ ቢዘጋጅም፣ የማያ ገጹ ዕይታ ማቦዘኛው እንደ Live TV የመሳሰሉ በውጫዊ ግብአቶች የዕይታ ተሞክሮዎን መረበሽን ለማስወገድ አይሰራም።

segment.source: Select the place where to use the TV.
If you select Store Demo mode, it is set to optimized values for retail displays selling TV.
segment.target: የማከማቻ ሰርቶ ማሳያ ሁነታ ከመረጡ፣ ለችርቻሮ እይታ መሸጫ ቲቪ ወደ ተቡ እሴቶችን ይዘጋጃል።

segment.source: Revert TV to its initial settings.
This will revert all options on TV to their default settings.
segment.target: ይህ በቲቪ ሁሉም አማራጮችን ወደ ነባሪ ቅንብሮቻቸው ይመልሳል።

segment.source: If the time you set is much different from the current time, some of the smart features may not be displayed.
segment.target: የአሁኑ ሰዓት ካዘጋጁት ሰዓት ብዙ የሚለይ ከሆነ፣ አንዳንድ የዘመናዊ ባህሪያትን ላይታዩ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Turn on/off the images to be displayed on screen when there is no signal.
segment.target: ምንም ምልክት ከሌለ ምስሎችን እንዲታዩ ያብሩ/ያጥፉ።

segment.source: Check descriptions for each LG webOS TV functions.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ LG webOS TV ተግባር መግለጫዎችን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: Adjust whether to display the home promotion.
Set the specialized functions of SIGNATURE TV.
segment.target: የ SIGNATURE TV ልዩ ተግባሮቹን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Confirm the terms and conditions or change whether to accept the agreement.
segment.target: ደንቦች እና ሁነታዎችን ያረጋግጡ ወይም ስምምነቱን ለመቀበል ይለውጡ።.

segment.source: Set the additional functions related to the TV.
segment.target: ከቲቪው ጋር የተያያዙ ተጨማሪ ተግባራትን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Check alarm messages about the user settings or TV status.
segment.target: ስለ ተጠቃሚዎች ቅንብሮች ወይም የቲቪ አቋምን ማንቂያ መልእክቶችን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: Connect the LAN cable directly to the TV to use the network.
segment.target: አውታረ መረቡን ለመጠቀም የ LAN ኬብሉን በቀጥታ ወደ ቲቪው ያገናኙ።

segment.source: Take advantage of features that require networking such as the Internet, apps, software updates and etc.
segment.target: በይነመረብ፣ መተግበሪያዎች፣ ሶፍትዌር ዝመናዎች እና ወዘተ የመሳሰሉ አውታረ መረብ የሚፈልጉ ባህሪያቶችን ይጠቀሙባቸዉ።.

segment.source: Connect to the network if a wireless router is installed.
segment.target: ሽቦ አልባ ራውተር ከተገጠመ አውታረ መረቡን ያገናኙ።

segment.source: Connect TV to external devices with Wi-Fi Direct without wireless router.
segment.target: ያለ ሽቦ አልባ ራውተር በ Wi-Fi Direct ቲቪን ወደ ውጫዊ መሳሪያዎች ያገናኑ።

segment.source: Enjoy content from the connected devices using the Photo & Video and the Music app in TV.
segment.target: ፎቶ እና ቪድዮ እና በቲቪ ውስጥ ያለው የሙዚቃ መተግበሪ በመጠቀም ይዘትን ከተገናኙ መሳሪያዎች ይደሰቱ።

segment.source: * Connect to the only device that supports Wi-Fi Direct.
segment.target: * Wi-Fi Direct የሚደግፍ መሳሪያ ብቻ ያገናኙ።

segment.source: Connect to the network using the 3G/4G network USB.
segment.target: የ 3G/4G የአውታረመረብ USB በመጠቀም ወደ አውታረመረቡ ይገናኙ።

segment.source: Connect external devices like Set-top box, Sound bar and etc to the TV based on guide.
segment.target: በመመሪያው መሰረት እንደ ሲግናል ተቀባይ ሳጥን፣ የድምጽ አሞሌ እና ወዘተ የመሳሰሉ ውጫዊ መሳሪያዎች ወደ ቲቪው ያገናኙ።

segment.source: If Universal Control of Set-top box/OTT has been set up, take advantage of using Set-top box connected from LG remote control.
segment.target: የሲግናል ተቀባይ ሳጥን/OTT ዓለምአቀፋዊ ቁጥጥር ከተቀናበረ፣ ከ LG የሩቅ ቁጥጥር የተገናኘውን የሲግናል ተቀባይ ሳጥን ይጠቀሙ።

segment.source: Turn on TV with mobile device same as smartphone.
segment.target: ልክ እንደ ዘመናዊ ሞባይል በሞባይል መሳሪያ ቲቪውን ያብሩ።

segment.source: Delete the device connection history of Screen Share.
segment.target: የ Screen Share የመሳሪያው ግንኙነት ታሪክን ይሰርዙ።

segment.source: Link the information about devices connected to HDMI ports to the TV and set the related settings.
segment.target: ወደ HDMI ማስገቢያዎች የተገናኙ መሳሪያዎች መረጃውን ወደ ቲቪ ያገናኙ እና የተዛመዱ ቅንብሮችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Register the TV to LG account to control the TV with the voice recognition of external device(AI speaker and etc).
segment.target: ቲቪውን በውጫዊ መሳሪያ ድምጽ መለየት (የ AI ድምጽ ማጉያ እና ወዘተ) ለመቆጣጠር ቲቪውን ወደ LG መለያ ይመዝግቡ።

segment.source: Set and edit the IP address version to IPv4 or IPv6.
segment.target: የ IP አድራሻ ስሪትን ወደ IPv4 ወይም IPv6 ያዘጋጁ እና ያርትዑ።

segment.source: For a WPS(Wi-Fi Protected Setup)-enabled wireless router, press the WPS-PBC button to connect TV to the wireless network.
segment.target: ለ WPS (በ Wi-Fi የተጠበቀ ቅንብር)-የነቃ ሽቦ አልባ ራውተር፣ ቲቪ ወደ ሽቦ አልባ አውታረመረብ ለማገናኘት የ WPS-PBC አዝራሩን ይጫኑ።

segment.source: For a WPS(Wi-Fi Protected Setup)-enabled wireless router, Enter PIN code to connect TV to the wireless network.
segment.target: ለ WPS (በ Wi-Fi የተጠበቀ ቅንብር)-የነቃ ሽቦ አልባ ራውተር፣ ቲቪ ወደ ሽቦ አልባ አውታረመረብ ለማገናኘት የ PIN ኮድ ያስገቡ።

segment.source: Connect to the network by manually entering the IP and DNS server addresses.
segment.target: የ IP እና የ DNS አገልጋይ አድራሻዎችን በእጅ በማስገባት ወደ አውታረ መረቡ ይገናኙ።

segment.source: Turn on the TV using your mobile device via Wi-Fi.
segment.target: ሞባይል መሳሪያዎን በ Wi-Fi በኩል በመጠቀም ቲቪውን ያብሩ።

segment.source: * You can control the app which supports the function on your mobile device.
segment.target: * በሞባይል መሳሪያዎ ውስጥ ተግባሩን ከሚደግፈው መተግበሪያ መቆጣጠር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Turn on the TV using mobile device via Bluetooth.
segment.target: ቲቪውን የሞባይል መሳሪያ በመጠቀም በ Bluetooth በኩል አብራ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} እና HDMI {port2} ማስገቢያዎች ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል እና ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: View the original screen as it is or set the screen size and aspect ratio.
segment.target: ኦሪጂናል ማያ ገጹን እንዳለ ይመለከቱ ወይም የማያ ገጹን መጠን እና ምጥነ ገጽታውን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Display the optimal resolution for the content by an algorithm learned via a deep learning technique.
segment.target: የይዘቱን ልክ ጥራት በጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም አሳይ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} port supports the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} ማስገቢያ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል እና ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, and HDMI {port3} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2} እና HDMI {port3} ማስገቢያዎች ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል እና ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3}, and HDMI {port4} ports support the Instant Game Response, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2}፣ HDMI {port3} እና HDMI {port4} ማስገቢያዎች ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ይደግፋል እና ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋትይችላሉ።

segment.source: View the original screen as it is received from broadcasts signal or connected device.
segment.target: ኦሪጂናል ማያ ገጹን ከስርጭት ሲግናል ወይም የተገናኘው መሳሪያ እንደተቀበለው ይመለከቱ።

segment.source: Do not unplug the power during this function is running.
segment.target: ይህ ተግባር በመሄድ ላይ እያለ የኤሌክትሪክ ኅይሉን አይንቀሉ።

segment.source: Select picture mode for clear picture, cinema, game, etc and adjust the contrast, color, etc of the mode in detail.
segment.target: ጥራት ላለው ስእል፣ ሲነማ፣ ጨዋታ፣ ወዘተ የስእል ሁነታ ይምረጡ እና የሁነታውን ንጽጽር፣ ቀለም፣ ወዘተ በዝርዝር ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust Backlight brightness to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: ማያ ገጹን ለማድመቅ ወይም ለማጥቆር የኃላ ብርሃን ብርሁነት ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust the tint to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: ማያ ገጹን ለማድመቅ ወይም ለማጥቆር ቀለሙን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust the OLED LIGHT to brighten or darken the screen.
segment.target: ማያ ገጹን ለማድመቅ ወይም ለማጥቆር የ OLED LIGHT ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Adjust the screen color to be pale or deep.
segment.target: የማያ ገጹን ቀለም ወደ ደብዛዛ ወይም ደማቅ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: The closer to 100, the clearer the color becomes.
segment.target: ወደ 100 ሲጠጋ ቀለሙ ጥርት ያለ ይሆናል።

segment.source: Adjust the balance of red and green to display the tint on the screen.
segment.target: ቀለሙን በማያ ገጽ ለማሳየት የቀይ እና የአረንጓዴ ማስተካከያው ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: The closer to 50 the clearer the red, the closer to 50 the clearer the green.
segment.target: ወደ 50 ሲጠጋ ቀዩ ጥርት ይላል፣ ወደ 50 ሲጠጋ አረንጓዴው ጥርት ይላል።

segment.source: Adjust the contrast, resolution, etc for individual picture mode in detail and set preferred color, gamma, etc additionally.
segment.target: የእያንዳንዱን ስእል ሁነታ ንጽጽር፣ ጥራት፣ ወዘተ በዝርዝር ያስተካክሉ እና የተመረጠውን ቀለም፣ ጋማ፣ ወዘተ በተጨማሪ ይዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Adjust the color balance by change color temperature, luminance, and red, green, blue intensity.
segment.target: የቀለምን ደማቅነት፣ አንጸባራቂነት እና ቀይ፣ አረንጓዴ፣ ሰማያዊ መጠን በመለወጥ የቀለም ማስተካከያውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Change red intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: የቀይ መጠን ይለውጡ እና የቀለም ማስተካከያውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Change green intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: የአረንጓዴ መጠን ይለውጡ እና የቀለም ማስተካከያውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Change blue intensity and adjust the color balance.
segment.target: የሰማያዊ መጠን ይለውጡ እና የቀለም ማስተካከያውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Save the white balance settings from the current picture mode in all inputs.
segment.target: በሁሉም ግብአቶች ከአሁኑ የምስል ሁነታ የነጭ ማስተካከያ ቅንብሮችን አስቀምጥ።

segment.source: Set necessary additional functions based on watching environment and screen status.
segment.target: በመመልከት አካባቢ እና የማያ ገጽ አቋም መሰረት አስፈላጊ ተጨማሪ ተግባሮችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Reduce irregular noise from digital video signals to optimize image quality clearly.
segment.target: የምስል ጥራትን በጥራት ለማትባት ከአሃዛዊ የቪድዮ ሲግናሎች መደበኛ ያልሆነ ድምጽ ይቀንሱ።

notes.note: 기존 리얼 시네마 도움말 국문 변경

segment.source: Adjust the frame ratio in the same way with the movie and it provides the feeling of the movie theater.
segment.target: የፍሬም ምጥነቱን ልክ እንደ ፊልሙ ያስተካክሉ እና እንደ ፊልም ትያትር ስሜት ይሰጣል።

segment.source: Optimize image quality lightly and vividly for fast-moving images such as sports and action.
segment.target: እንደ ስፖርቶች እና እርምጃዎች የመሳሰሉ ለፈጣን የእንቅስቃሴ ምስሎች የምስል ጥራት በስስ እና ደማቅ ያትቡት።

segment.source: Apply the detailed setting values of current picture mode to all inputs or apps.
segment.target: የአሁን የስእል ሁነታ የዝርዝር ቅንብር እሴቶችን ወደ ሁሉም ግብአቶች ወይም መተግበሪያዎች ይተግብሩ።

segment.source: Revert picture setting values to default.
segment.target: የስእል ቅንብር እሴቶችን ወደ ነባሪ ይመልሱ።

segment.source: It is reset to picture mode individually, so select the desired picture mode and reset it.
segment.target: በየግል ወደ ስእል ሁነታ ዳግም እንዲጀምር ተደርጓል፣ ስለዚህ የተፈለገውን የስእል ሁነታ ይምረጡ እና እንደገማ ያስጀምሩት።

segment.source: If the edge of the screen is not clean, please turn this function off.
segment.target: የማያው ጫፍ ንጹህ ካልሆነ፣ እባክዎ ይህንን ተግባር ያጥፉት።

segment.source: Adjust color temperature automatically to reduce eye strain.
segment.target: የዓይን ህመም ለመቀነስ የቀለም ደማቅነትን በራሱ ጊዜ አስተካክል።

segment.source: If a device connected to the port, you can view the optimized picture of the game with minimizing delay or interruption of device video.
segment.target: መሳሪያ ወደ ማስገቢያዉ ከተገናኘ፣ የተባውን የጨዋታ ስእል በትንሽ መዘግየት ወይም የመሳሪያው ቪድዮ መቆራረጥ መመልከት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: * The device connected should support this service.
segment.target: * የተገናኘው መሳሪያ ይህንን አገልግሎት መደገፍ አለበት።

segment.source: Correct picture pixel and prevent picture quality issues that may cause when the TV has been turned on for an extended period of time.
segment.target: ቲቪዎ ረዘም ላለ ከበራ በኋላ ሊከሰቱ የሚችሉ የምስል ፒክሰል ያስተካክሉ እና የምስል ጥራት ጉዳዮችን ይከላከሉ።

segment.source: Save the color adjustment settings from the current picture mode in all inputs.
segment.target: ለሁሉም ግብዓቶች ከአሁኑ የምስል ሁነታ የቀለም ማስተካከል ቅንጅቶችን አስቀምጥ።

segment.source: Revert color adjustment settings to default.
segment.target: የቀለም ማስተካከያ ቅንብሮች ወደ ነባሪው መልስ።

segment.source: Set locking on the specified channels, apps, inputs and etc to use under parents guidance.
segment.target: በወላጆች ክትትል ስር ለመጠቀም በተወሰኑ ጣቢያዎች፣ መተግበሪያዎች፣ ግብዓቶች እና ወዘተ መቆለፍን እንዲበራ ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on specified ages or contents ratings under parents guidance.
segment.target: በወላጆች ክትትል ስር በተወሰኑ ዕድሜዎች ወይም ይዘቶች ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching programs based on rating.
Restrict watching based on age ratings for children programs.
segment.target: ለልጆች ፕሮግራሞች በዕድሜ ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on fantasy violence content ratings.
segment.target: በትንግርት ሁከት ይዘት ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on ages ratings.
segment.target: በዕድሜ ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on programs containing sexually suggestive dialogue.
segment.target: ወሲባዊ ቀስቃሽ ንግግር የያዙ ፕሮግራሞችን መሰረት በማድረግ መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on programs containing adult language.
segment.target: የአዋቂ ቋንቋ የያዙ ፕሮግራሞችን መሰረት በማድረግ መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on programs containing sexual scene.
segment.target: የወሲብ ትዕይንት የያዙ ፕሮግራሞችን መሰረት በማድረግ መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Restrict watching movies based on rating.
segment.target: በደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት በማድረግ መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Some material may not be appropriate for children.
segment.target: አንዳንድ ይዘቶች ለህጻናት ተገቢ ላይሆኑ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Some material may not be appropriate for children under 13.
segment.target: አንዳንድ ቁሳቁስ ከ 13 ዓመት በታች ለሆኑ ህጻናት ተገቢ ላይሆኑ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Children over 8 are allowed to watch.
segment.target: ዕድሜያቸው ከ 8 በላይ ለሆኑ ልጆች ለመመልከት ተፈቅዶላቸዋል።

segment.source: Adolescent over 14 are allowed to watch.
segment.target: ዕድሜያቸው ከ 14 በላይ ለሆኑ ጎረምሶች ለመመልከት ተፈቅዶላቸዋል።

segment.source: Adolescent over 13 are allowed to watch.
segment.target: ዕድሜያቸው ከ 13 በላይ ለሆኑ ጎረምሶች ለመመልከት ተፈቅዶላቸዋል።

segment.source: Adolescent over 16 are allowed to watch.
segment.target: ዕድሜያቸው ከ 16 በላይ ለሆኑ ጎረምሶች ለመመልከት ተፈቅዶላቸዋል።

segment.source: Restrict watching based on content rating.
segment.target: በይዘት ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Select the channel to restrict watching.
Select the app to restrict the use.
Select the inputs to restrict the use.
Restrict watching based on violence content ratings.
segment.target: በሁከት ይዘት ደረጃ አሰጣጥ መሰረት መመልከትን ገድብ።

segment.source: Enjoy Dolby Atmos content with the optimal sound by turning the sound field effect on.
segment.target: የድምጽ መስክ ማሳመሪያ በማብራት በምጥን ድምጽ የ Dolby Atmos ይዘትን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: * This settings is only available for Internal TV Speaker.
segment.target: * ይህ ቅንብር የሚገኘው ለውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር ብቻ ነው።

segment.source: Set the optimized sound automatically depending on current content types.
segment.target: በአሁኑ ይዘት ዓይነቶች መሰረት በማድረግ የተመጠነውን ድምጽ በራሱ ጊዜ አንዲያዘጋጅ አድርግ።

segment.source: It provides the optimal Virtual 5.1 surround for the watching content with an algorithm learned from LG deep learning technique.
segment.target: ከ LG ጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም ከይዘት ጋር ለመመልከት ልከኛ ምናባዊ 5.1 አካባቢ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: Select the sound mode for Music, Cinema(Movie), Game, etc and set detailed audio effects.
segment.target: ለሙዚቃ፣ ሲነማ(ፊልም)፣ ጨዋታ፣ ወዘተ የድምጽ ሁነታን ይምረጡ እና ዝርዝር የድምጽ ማሳመሪያዎችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Select device or speaker for audio output.
segment.target: ለድምጽ ውጫዊ መሳሪያ ወይም ስፒከር ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Use Magic Remote to analyze the room’s acoustics and optimize TV’s sound based on the results.
segment.target: የክፍሉን የድምጽ ማስተጋባት ለመተንተን MAGIC Remote እና በውጤቶቹ መሰረት የቲቪውን የድምጽ ጥራት በአግባቡ ይጠቀሙ።
ተጨማሪ ድምጽ ጋር የተያያዙ ቅንብሮችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Select the optimal sound mode for Clear Voice III, Music, Cinema(Movie), etc.
segment.target: ለጥራት ድምጽ III፣ ሙዚቃ፣ ሲነማ(ፊልም)፣ ወዘተ ምጥን የድምጽ ሁነታ ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Set the virtual multi-channel surround sound effect to enjoy more realistic sound.
segment.target: ተጨማሪ ትክክለኛ ድምጽ ለመደሰት virtual የብዙ-ጣቢያ surround ድምጽን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Set the virtual surround sound effect to enjoy more realistic sound.
segment.target: ተጨማሪ ትክክለኛ ድምጽ ለመደሰት virtual surround ድምጽን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Set the Dolby Atmos virtual multi-channel surround sound effect to enjoy more realistic sound.
segment.target: ተጨማሪ እውነተኛ ድምጽ ለመደሰት Dolby Atmos virtual ለባለብዙ-ጣቢያ surround ድምጽን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Set the virtual DTS multi-channel surround sound effect reinforced by upward sound field effects to enjoy more realistic sound.
segment.target: ተጨማሪ ትክክለኛ ድምጽ ለመደሰት ድምጽ መስክ ማሳመሪያዎች ወደላይ በማጉላት virtual DTS ባለብዙ-ጣቢያ surround ድምጽ ማሳመሪያ ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Adjust the sound to meet your taste for each sound frequency band.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ የድምጽ ድግግሞሽ ባንድ ጣዕምዎን ለማሟላት ድምጹን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Revert detailed sound effect settings of standard mode to default.
segment.target: የመደበኛ ሁኔታ ወደ ነባሪ ዝርዝር የድምጽ ማሳመሪያ ቅንብሮችን ይመልሱ።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound through audio devices connected to the OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT.
segment.target: ድምጽን ከ OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT በተያያዙ የድምጽ መሳሪያዎችን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound through audio devices connected to the HDMI IN (ARC) port.
segment.target: ወደ HDMI IN (ARC) ማስገቢያ የተገናኙ የድምጽ መሳሪያዎች በኩል የቲቪ ድምጽ ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy sound with a wireless audio device connected to the LG Sound Sync or Bluetooth.
segment.target: ወደ LG Sound Sync ወይም Bluetooth በሽቦ አልባ ድምጽ መሳሪያ የተገናኘውን ድምጽ ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: It may not sound depending on connected devices.
segment.target: በተገናኙ መሳሪያዎች መሰረት ድምጽ ላይሰጥ ይችላል።

segment.source: Connect your TV with WiSA Speakers wirelessly.
segment.target: ቲቪዎን ከ WiSA ስፒከሮች ጋር በሽቦ አልባ ያገናኙ።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound via audio devices connected to the external Audio Out/Headphones output ports.
segment.target: ወደ ውጫዊ Audio Out/Headphones ማስገቢያዎች የተገናኙ ከውጫዊ የድምጽ/ሄድፎኖች ውጫዊ ወደቦች የተገናኙ የድምጽ መሳሪያዎች በኩል ድምጽን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound by connecting Wired Headphones.
segment.target: በባለ ገመድ ሄድፎኖች በማገናኘት የቲቪ ድምጽን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound via external audio devices connected to both the Internal TV Speaker and the OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT port.
segment.target: ከውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር እና ከOPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT ማስገቢያ ከሁለቱም ጋር የተገናኙ መሳሪያዎች ውጫዊ ድምጽ በኩል የቲቪ ድምጽ ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound via both the Internal TV Speaker and Wired Headphones.
segment.target: ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር እና ባለ ገመድ ሄድፎኖች በኩል በሁለቱም ድምጹን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Enjoy the sound optimized to the room.
Enjoy a clear and natural sound.
segment.target: ጥርት ያለ እና ተፈጥሯዊ ድምጽን ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: Reinforce the low-pitched tone of the optimized sound.
segment.target: የተስተካከለውን ድምጽ ዝቅተኛ የድምጽ ቃና ያጠናክሩ።

segment.source: Reinforce a high-pitched tone of the optimized sound.
segment.target: የተስተካከለውን ድምጽ ከፍተኛ የድምጽ ቃና ያጠናክሩ።

segment.source: To optimize the sound, play test sound on TV and start measuring reflected-sound using the Magic Remote.
segment.target: ድምጹን ለማትባት፣ በቲቪው ላይ የድምጽ ሙከራን ያጫውቱ እና የ Magic Remote በመጠቀም አንጸባራቂ-ድምጽ መለካት ይጀምሩ።

segment.source: Get started in a quiet environment for sound optimization.
segment.target: ለድምጽ ትባት ጸጥታ ባለበት አካባቢ ይጀምሩ

segment.source: It provides the optimized sound by tuning up the reflected-sound in the room based on type of TV installation.
segment.target: በቲቪ ተከላ ዓይነት መሰረት በማድረግ በክፍሉ ውስጥ የአንጸባራቂ ድምጽ ከፍ በማድረግ የተስተካከለ ድምጽ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: Automatically adjust the gap in sound volume, or set the volume of sound that is adjusted at a time with the volume key on remote control.
segment.target: ክፍተቱን በራስሰር በድምጽ መጠን ያስተካክሉ ወይም በሩቅ መቆጣጠሪያው ላይ ያለው የድምጽ ቁልፍ በጊዜ የሚስተካከል ድምጽ ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: If the program does not support the selected output format, the default output from the source will be used.
segment.target: ፕሮግራሙ የተመረጠውን የውጤት ቅርጸት የማይደግፍ ከሆነ፣ ነባሩ ውጤት ከምጩ ጥቅም ላይ ይውላል።

segment.source: Adjust the timing to synchronize when the video and audio have time difference.
segment.target: ቪድዮ እና ድምጹ የጊዜ ልዩነት ሲኖራቸው ለማስመር ጊዜውን ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Select the format to transfer TV Digital Sound Out to an external device.
segment.target: የቲቪ ዲጂታል ድምጽ ማውጫ ወደ ውጫዊ መሳሪያ ለማሰተላለፍ ቅርፀቱን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Enjoy TV sound via an LG audio device connected to the OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT port.
segment.target: በ LG የድምጽ መሳሪያ በኩል ወደ OPTICAL DIGITAL AUDIO OUT ወደብ የተገናነውን የቲቪ ድምጽ ይደሰቱበት።

segment.source: With this option, you can control the audio device's volume with your TV remote.
segment.target: በዚህ አማራጭ፣ በቲቪዎ የሩቅ መቆጣጠሪያ የድምጽ መሳሪያውን መቆጣጠር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: If you can't hear sound through the device, make sure it is working properly and supports LG Sound Sync.
segment.target: በመሳሪያው አማካኝነት ድምጽ መስማት ካልቻሉ፣ በአግባቡ እየሰራ መሆኑን እና LG Sound Syncን የሚደግፍ መሆኑን ያረጋግጡ።

segment.source: Connect an external audio device, which supports the eARC, to the eARC.
segment.target: የ eARC ወደ eARC የሚደግፍ ወደ ውጫዊ የድምጽ መሳሪያ ያገናኙ።

segment.source: Select this type if your installed TV is stand and more than 30cm to the wall.
segment.target: የተተከለው ቲቪዎ ቋሚ እና ከግድግዳው 30ሳሜ በላይ ከሆነ ይህንን ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select this type if your installed TV is stand and less than 30cm to the wall.
segment.target: የተተከለው ቲቪዎ ቋሚ እና ከግድግዳው 30ሳሜ ያነሰ ከሆነ ይህንን ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: It provides you with clearer sound quality by reducing the reflected low-pitched sound on the wall.
segment.target: በግድግዳው ላይ ያለውን አንጸባራቂ ዝቅተኛ ድምጽ በመቀነስ ጥርት ባለው የድምጽ ጥራት ያቀርብልዎታል።

segment.source: Select this type if your installed TV is wall-mounted.
segment.target: የተተከለው ቲቪዎ ከግድግዳ ጋር የተያያዘ ከሆነ ይህንን ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: The gap between the sound volumes of the channel and program is automatically set to watch the program with a consistent volume.
segment.target: በጣቢያው የድምጽ መጠኖች እና በፕሮግራሙ መሃል ያለውን ክፍተት ፕሮግራሙን በቀጣይ የድምጽ መጠን ለመመልከት በራስሰር ተዘጋጅቷል።

segment.source: Adjust the volume you want with pressing remote's volume key.
segment.target: የሩቅ መቆጣጠሪያውን የድምጽ ቁልፍ በመጫን የፈለጉትን ድምጽ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: The higher the settings, the louder the sound rapidly.
segment.target: ቅንብሮቹ በበለጡ ጊዜ፣ የድምጹ ፍጥነት ይጨምራል።

segment.source: Find and tell an audio device available to connect around TV.
segment.target: በቲቪ አካባቢ ለማገናኘት ሊገኝ የሚችል የድምጽ መሳሪያ ያግኙ እና ይንገሩ።

segment.source: * This feature is available on certain devices only.
segment.target: * ይህ ባህሪ በአንዳንድ መሳሪያዎች ብቻ ይገኛል።

segment.source: Set the detect range of device available to connect.
segment.target: ለመገናኘት ያለ መሳሪያ የመገኘት ርቀቱን አዘጋጅ።

segment.source: When the Sound Out is set to Bluetooth or the connected device does not support the Instant Game Response, it may not work properly.
segment.target: ውጫዊ ድምጽ ወደ Bluetooth ሲዘጋጁ ወይም የተገናኘው መሳሪያ ፈጣኑን የጨዋታ ምላሽ የማይደግፍ ሲሆን፣ በአግባቡ ላይሰራ ይችላል።

segment.source: Select the optimal sound mode for Clear Voice Ⅲ, Music, Cinema(Movie), etc.
segment.target: ለጥራት ድምጽ Ⅲ፣ ሙዚቃ፣ ሲነማ(ፊልም)፣ ወዘተ ምጥን የድምጽ ሁነታ ይምረጡ።

segment.source: It works only when the broadcasting program supports subtitles.
segment.target: የሚሰራው የስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ የግርጌ ትርጉሞችን ሲደግፍ ነው።

segment.source: It works only when the broadcasting program supports captions.
segment.target: የሚሰራው የስርጭት ፕሮግራሙ መግለጫ ጽሑፍን ሲደግፍ ነው።

segment.source: Analyze characteristics of sound and optimize sound for each content in real time.
segment.target: የድምጽ ባህሪያትን ተንትን እና በእውነተኛ ጊዜ ለእያንዳንዱ ይዘት ድምጹን ያትቡ።

segment.source: Play the standard sound suitable for all types of content.
segment.target: ለሁሉም የይዘት ዓይነቶች የሚስማማ መደበኛ ድምጹን ያጫውቱ።

segment.source: Optimize the sound for a cinematic experience.
Output sound through an wireless audio device via Bluetooth. Please check the power and connection status of the audio device.
segment.target: የውጫዊ ድምጽ በሽቦ አልባ የድምጽ መሳሪያ በ Bluetooth በኩል። እባክዎ የድምጽ መሳሪያውን ኅይሉን እና ግንኙነቱን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: * Please note that there may be a compatibility issue depending on the connected Bluetooth device type.
segment.target: * እባክዎ ያስታውሱ እንደተገናኘ የ Bluetooth መሳርያ ዓይነት የተስማሚነት ችግር ሊኖር ይችላል።

notes.note: Sound Mode's help string. (It has 'objet_soundMode' key)

segment.source: Optimize sound mode for each content type.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ የይዘት አይነት የድምጽ ሁነታን አትባ።

segment.source: If the program does not support multiple audio, the default audio is selected.
segment.target: ፕሮግራሙ ባለብዙ ድምጽ የማይደግፍ ከሆነ፣ ነባሩ ድምጽ ይመረጣል።

segment.source: The edited left FHD picture quality and right UHD picture quality display differently by the resolution difference.
segment.target: የተረታው የግራ FHD ስእል ጥራት እና የቀኝ የ UHD ስእል ጥራት ዕይታ በጥራት ልዩነት ይለያያል።

segment.source: Enjoy UHD content in UHD picture quality.
segment.target: የ UHD ይዘትን በ UHD ስእል ጥራት ይደሰቱበት።

notes.note: [webOS 4.0] Start New Sound Tuning's helpString in One Touch Sound Tuning.

segment.source: Begin the AI Acoustic Tuning process to determine the optimum audio quality settings for your room.
segment.target: ለእርስዎ ክፍል ከፍተኛውን የኦዲዮ ጥራት ቅንብሮችን ለመወሰን AI የመስሚያ ቅኝት ስራ ሂደትን ይጀምሩ።

notes.note: [webOS 4.0] Off's helpString in One Touch Sound Tuning.

segment.source: Do not apply the AI Acoustic Tuning recommended audio settings.
segment.target: የሚመከሩ AI የመስሚያ ቅኝት ኦዲዮ ቅንብሮችን አትተግብር።

notes.note: [webOS 4.0] One Touch Sound Tuning's item name.

segment.source: [{Device}] will be removed from the paired device list. If you want to reconnect it, you need to search for connectable devices again. Do you want to continue?
segment.target: [{Device}] ከተጣመሩ የመሳሪያዎች ዝርዝር ላይ ይወገዳል። ሊያጣምሩት ከፈለጉ፣ የሚገኙ መሳሪያዎችን ፈልገው እንደገና ማጣመር ያስፈልግዎታል። መቀጠል ይፈልጋሉ?
የ Bluetooth አከባቢ + ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር

segment.source: Do you want to reset Position Settings?
Do you want to reset Volume Control?
segment.target: የድምጽ መጠን መቆጣጠሪያን እንደገና ለማስጀመር ይፈልጋሉ?

segment.source: If you turn off 'Quick Start+', you will not be able to turn on your TV with Remote Free Control. Would you like to continue?
segment.target: ‹ፈጣን ጅምር +› ን ካጠፉት ቲቪዎን በርቀት ነፃ ቁጥጥር ማብራት አይችሉም። ለመቀጠል ይፈልጋሉ?

segment.source: Set or extend the color gamut automatically according to the signal, and display it in a sharper, richer color.
segment.target: የቀለም ጋማውን በምልክትው መሠረት በራስ-ሰር ያዋቅሩ ወይም ያራዝሙና ይበልጥ ጥራት ባለው የበለፀገ ቀለም ያሳዩ።

segment.source: The language used for Voice Recognition is set according to the selected menu language. Support services may vary depending on the voice language.
segment.target: ለድምጽ ማወቂያ የሚጠቀምበት ቋንቋ በተመረጠው ምናሌ ቋንቋ መሠረት ይዘጋጃል። የድጋፍ አገልግሎቶች በድምጽ ቋንቋው ሊለያዩ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The sound may not be output when digital sound output is set to Pass Through.
segment.target: የዲጂታል ድምጽ ማውጫ ወደ Pass Through በሚዘጋጅበት ጊዜ ድምጹ ወደ ውጭ አይወጣም።

segment.source: Use the 4-way controller to change the position and press the OK button.
segment.target: ቦታውን ለመለወጥ እና እሺን ቁልፍን በመጫን 4-መንገድ መቆጣጠሪያውን ይጠቀሙ።

segment.source: Use the following services with the selected language.

segment.target: ባለገመድ የጆሮ ማዳመጫዎች + ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር

segment.source: The internal TV speaker and Bluetooth speakers can output sound simultaneously, creating a vivid surround sound effect.
segment.target: ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር እና የ Bluetooth ስፒከር ከድምጽ አከባቢ የድምፅ ተፅእኖ በመፍጠር በአንድ ጊዜ ድምፅን ማውጣት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Connect Bluetooth speakers and the TV speakers and adjust the audio delay between the speakers. You can manually adjust the audio delay and volume balance.
segment.target: የ Bluetooth ድምጽ ማጉያዎችን እና የቲቪ ድምጽ ስፒከርዎቹን ያገናኙ እና በድምጽ ማጉያዎቹ መካከል ያለውን የኦዲዮ መዘግየት ያስተካክሉ። የድምፅ መዘግየት እና የድምፅ ሚዛን እራስዎ ማስተካከል ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Reset the Bluetooth Surround + Internal TV Speaker settings.
segment.target: የ Bluetooth ዙሪያውን + ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር ቅንብሮችን ዳግም ያስጀምሩ።

segment.source: View a list of available devices.
Select a sound mode suitable for the type of content and set detailed audio effects for the standard sound mode.
segment.target: ለይዘቱ ዓይነት የሚስማማውን የድምፅ ሞድ ይምረጡ እና ለመደበኛ የድምፅ ሞድ ዝርዝር የድምጽ ተፅእኖዎችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Select a sound mode and effect.
Select an audio format for each HDMI input.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ የ HDMI ግብዓት የድምጽ ቅርጸት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Check whether the Bluetooth device is in pairing mode.
segment.target: የ Bluetooth መሣሪያው በማጣመር ሁኔታ ላይ መሆኑን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: Check whether the Bluetooth device is connected to another device.
segment.target: የ Bluetooth መሣሪያ ከሌላ መሣሪያ ጋር የተገናኘ መሆኑን ይፈትሹ።

segment.source: 1. Disable Bluetooth on the other device.
2. Turn the Bluetooth device off and on.

segment.target: በአውታረ መረብ ላይ የተመሠረተ የግላዊነት ማላበስ ምክሮች

segment.source: Set up an account to use LG Services.
segment.target: የ LG አገልግሎቶችን ለመጠቀም መለያ ያዋቅሩ።

segment.source: Set detailed options for the Home feature.
Set whether to display Home when the TV is turned on.
segment.target: ቴሌቪዥኑ በሚበራበት ጊዜ ወደ ቤት መታየቱን ያዋቅሩ።

segment.source: Set detailed options for the Recommendation feature.
Set detailed options for the Voice Recognition feature.
segment.target: ለድምጽ ማወቂያ ባህሪ ዝርዝር አማራጮችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Automatically adjust to a screen mode optimized for a specific type of content.
segment.target: ለተወሰነ የይዘት አይነት በተመቻቸ ማያ ገጽ ሁኔታ ላይ በራስ-ሰር ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Set up additional features related to customer support.
segment.target: ከደንበኛ ድጋፍ ጋር የሚዛመዱ ተጨማሪ ባህሪያትን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Check for software updates and update if available.
segment.target: የሶፍትዌር ዝመናዎችን ይፈትሹ እና ካለ ያዘምኑ።

segment.source: Set settings related to your wired / wireless network.
segment.target: ከእርስዎ ባለ ገመድ / ገመድ-አልባ አውታረመረብ ጋር የሚዛመዱ ቅንብሮችን ያዋቅሩ።

segment.source: Set easy connection settings with external devices.
segment.target: ከውጭ መሣሪያዎች ጋር ቀላል የግንኙነት ቅንብሮችን ያዋቅሩ።

segment.source: Set smartphone and PC connection settings. To connect your TV to a mobile device, connection setup and a request are required from a smartphone or PC.
segment.target: የስማርትፎን እና ፒሲ ግንኙነት ቅንጅቶችን ያዋቅሩ ፡፡ ቴሌቪዥንዎን ከሞባይል መሣሪያ ጋር ለማገናኘት የግንኙነት ማቀናበሪያ እና ጥያቄ ከስማርትፎን ወይም ፒሲ ያስፈልጋል ።

segment.source: Signal interference may reduce the Magic Remote's sensitivity if a wireless router is too close to the TV.
segment.target: ሽቦ አልባው ራውተር ለቴሌቪዥኑ በጣም ቅርብ ከሆነ የ signage ጣልቃገብነት የ Magic Remote ሊቀንስ ይችላል።

segment.source: Content will play with sound suitable for multi-channel listening if multi-channel audio is supported by the HbbTV service.
segment.target: ባለብዙ ጣቢያ ድምጽ በ HbbTV አገልግሎት የተደገፈ ከሆነ ይዘቱ ለባለብዙ ቻናል ማዳመጥ ምቹ በሆነ ድምጽ ይጫወታ።

segment.source: Manage channels stored on the TV.
View items more clearly by changing the color of the menu on the screen to black and white.
segment.target: በማያ ገጹ ላይ ያለውን የምናሌን ቀለም ወደ ጥቁር እና ነጭ በመቀየር እቃዎችን የበለጠ በግልጽ ይመልከቱ።

segment.source: Invert and compensate certain colors in some menus to enhance the visibility of items displayed on the screen.
segment.target: በማያ ገጹ ላይ የሚታዩትን የንጥሎች ታይነት ከፍ ለማድረግ በተወሰኑ ምናሌዎች ውስጥ የተወሰኑ ቀለሞችን ይግለጹ እና ያክሏቸው።

segment.source: Set or reset the position of on-screen captions.
segment.target: የማያ ገጽ ላይ መግለጫ ፅሁፎችን ቦታ ያቀናብሩ ወይም እንደገና ያስጀምሩ ፡፡

segment.source: Change the position of captions using the 4-way dial on the remote control.
segment.target: በርቀት መቆጣጠሪያው ላይ ባለ 4-መንገድ መደወያን በመጠቀም የመግለጫ ፅሁፎችን አቀማመጥ ይለውጡ።

segment.source: Set detailed caption settings for HD broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ HD ስርጭቶች ዝርዝር መግለጫ ጽሑፎችን ያቀናብሩ ፡፡

segment.source: Select the caption type for digital broadcasts and set detailed subtitle settings.
segment.target: ለዲጂታል ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሑፍ አይነት ይምረጡ እና ዝርዝር ንዑስ ርዕሶችን ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: Specify detailed voice guidance settings after turning on this feature.
segment.target: ይህንን ባህሪ ካበሩ በኋላ ዝርዝር የድምፅ መመሪያ ቅንብሮችን ይጥቀሱ።

segment.source: Alerts you by sound when the TV is turned on or off.
segment.target: ቴሌቪዥኑ ሲበራ ወይም ሲጠፋ ድምጽ በመስጠት ያሳውቅዎታል።

segment.source: * This feature is applied once and only once when the TV is turned off.
segment.target: * ይህ ባህሪ ቴሌቪዥኑ ሲጠፋ አንዴ እና አንዴ ብቻ ነው የሚተገበረው።

segment.source: Select a video mode that matches the viewing environment, or specify settings for a video mode, such as contrast, color, and more.
segment.target: ከእይታ አከባቢ ጋር የሚዛመድ የቪዲዮ ሁነታን ይምረጡ ወይም እንደ ንፅፅር ፣ ቀለም እና ሌሎችም ያሉ ለቪዲዮ ሁኔታ ቅንብሮችን ይጥቀሱ።

segment.source: Select the appropriate picture mode according to the viewing environment or content type.
segment.target: በእይታ አካባቢ ወይም በይዘቱ አይነት መሠረት ተገቢውን የምስል ሁኔታ ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select the color range to be displayed.
Make blurry or difficult-to-see areas more vivid.
segment.target: አከባቢዎችን በብሩህ እይታ ወይም ለማየት አስቸጋሪ ያድርጉት።

segment.source: Display pictures in a warm or cool color temperature.
segment.target: በሞቃት ወይም በቀዝቃዛ ሙቀት ሥዕሎችን ያሳዩ።

segment.source: Display fast-moving content smoothly and clearly.
segment.target: በፍጥነት የሚንቀሳቀስ ይዘትን በቀስታ እና በግልፅ ያሳዩ።

segment.source: This is a closed caption preview
segment.target: ይህ የተዘጋ የመግለጫ ቅድመ እይታ ነው።

segment.source: Connection Management with a smartphone or PC is available. In order to connect a TV with a mobile device, connection settings and requests are required on the smartphone and PC.
segment.target: ከስማርት ስልክ ወይም ከኮምፕዩተር ጋር የግንኙነት አያያዝ አለ። ቲቪን ከሞባይል መሳሪያዎ ጋር ለማገናኘት፣ በስማርት ስልኩ እና በ ኮምፒዩተሩ የግንኙነት ቅንብረች እና ጥያቄዎች አስፈላጊዎች ናቸው።

segment.source: Check your TV status to solve problems or use remote support.
segment.target: ችግሮችን ለመፍታት ወይም የርቀት መቆጣጠሪያውን አገዛ ለመጠቀም የቲቪዎን አቋም ያስሱ።

segment.source: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
Set detailed options for the AI functions.
Check for Advertising settings and set it.
Check for available functions with Voice and set Voice Settings.
segment.target: ለድምጽ ያሉትን ተግባራት ያስሱ እና እንደ ድምጽ ቅንጅት ያዋቅሩት።

segment.source: AD ID is used to identify this device for advertising purposes and to facilitate certain ads that may be of interest to you. You can reset the AD ID or limit AD ID tracking below.
segment.target: የAD ID ይህንን መሳሪያ ለ ማስታወቂያ ተግባራት ለማወቅ እና ሊፈልጉት የሚችሉትን የተወሰኑ ማስታወቂያዎችን ለማመቻቸት ይጠቀማል። ከስር የAD ID ዳግም ማስጀመር ወይም የAD ID ክትትል መገደብ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: By pressing 'Reset', you will delete all the ad-related data LGE has collected from this Smart TV in the past. Pressing 'Reset' may impact the types of ads you see going forward, but it will not stop you from receiving ads.
segment.target: ‘ዳግም ማስጀመርን’ በመጫን፣ LGE ከአሁን በፊት ከ ስማርት ቲቪ የሰበሰበውን ማስታወቂያ ነክ መረጃ ይሰርዛሉ። ‘ዳግም ማስጀመርን’ መጫን ከዚህ በኋላ የሚያዩት ማስታወቂያ ላይ ተዕፅኖ ቢያደርግም፣ ማስታወቂያን እንዳያገኙ አያግዶትም።

segment.source: Activating this option will stop the collection and tracking of ad-related personal data from this Smart TV. Turning on the toggle may impact the types of ads you see going forward, but it will not stop you from receiving ads.
segment.target: ይህንን አማራጭ ማንቃት የማስታወቂያ ነክ ግላዊ መረጃን ከ ስማርት ቲቪው ላይ መሰብሰብ እና መከታተል ያቆማል። መቀየሪያውን ማብራት ከዚህ በኋላ የሚያዩት ማስታወቂያ ላይ ተዕፅኖ ቢያደርግም፣ ማስታወቂያን እንዳያገኙ አያግዶትም።

segment.source: Activating this toggle will cause LGE to instruct its third party providers to cease commercializing your personal information. Unless you separately opt out, you can still access services like Live Plus, LG Channels, and Get Now.
segment.target: ይህንን መቀየሪያ ማብራት የLGEን የ ሶስተኛ ወገን ተጠቃሚዎችን የግል መረጃዎትን ንግዳዊ ከማድረግ ክልከላ ያደርጋል። ለብቻ ካልመረጡ በቀር እንደ Live Plus፣ LG Channels፣ እና Get Now ያሉትን አገልግሎቶችን መጠቀም ይችላሉ።

segment.source: By turning Live Plus on, you understand that the content displayed on your TV can be recognized, and the viewing information may be used to provide you with an enhanced viewing experience and personalized services including content recommendations and advertisements. Please review the Privacy Policy and relevant User Agreements in the TV Settings menu for more information.
segment.target: Live Plus በማብራት፣ ቲቪዎ ላይ የሚታየው ይዘት እንደሚታወቅ ይረዳሉ፣ እና የእይታ መረጃውን ለእርስዎ በጎለበተ በእይታ ተሞክሮ እና በ ይዘት ምክርን እና ማስታወቂያን ያጠቃለለ ግላዊ አገልግሎት ለእርስዎ አቅርቦት ጥቅም ሊውል ይችላል። ለበለጠ መረጃ በቲቪ ቅንብሮች ምናሌ ውስጥ እባክዎን የግላዊ ፖሊሲውን እና የተጠቃሚ ስምምነቶችን ይመልከቱ።

segment.source: Recommendations are available for the people, products and locations related to the current program.
segment.target: አሁን ካለው ፕሮግራም ጋር በተገናኘ ለሰዎች፣ ለ ቁሶች እና ለቦታዎች ምክሮች ይገኛሉ።

segment.source: Recommend useful contents and features based on viewing history and app usage patterns.
segment.target: በእይታ ታሪክ እና በመተግበሪያ ጥቅም ስርዓተ ጥቅሞችን መሰረት ባደረገ ጠቃሚ ይዘቶችን እና ባህርዮችን ይምከሩ።

segment.source: You may receive diverse contents recommendations through Network. Turning this option off will only provide basic contents and some features may not be available.
segment.target: ብዙ ምክሮችን በ መረብ አውታሩ በኩል ሊቀበሉ ይችላሉ። ይህንን አማራጭ ካጠፉ መሰረታዊ የሆኑ ይዘቶችን ብቻ ይቀርብሎታል በተጨማሪም የተወሰኑ ባህርዮች ላይገኙ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Operate once when TV is off
Pixel Refresher begins only once when the TV is turned off.
segment.target: የፒክስል አዳሽ ቲቪው ከጠፋ ቡኋላ ብቻ ይጀምራል።

segment.source: Note : If your device does not support this feature, it may not work properly. In that case, you can connect the device to a different HDMI port or turn the HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color setting off.
segment.target: ማስታወሻ፥ መሳሪያዎ ይህንን ባህሪይ የማይደግፍ ከሆነ በትክክል ላይሰራ ይችላል። በዚያ ጊዜ፣ መሳሪያውን ከሌላ HDMI ወደብ ወይም የHDMI Ultra HD Deep Color ቅንብሮችን ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Turn on and off the Ultra HD Deep Color for HDMI {num} port.
segment.target: ለ HDMI {num} ወደብ የ Ultra HD Deep Color ያብሩ እና ያጥፉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1} port support Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} ወደብ የ Ultra HD Deep Color ን ይደግፋል።

segment.source: HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} እና HDMI {port2} ወደቦች የ Ultra HD Deep Color ን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2} and HDMI {port3} ports support Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2} እና HDMI {port3} ወደቦች የ Ultra HD Deep Color ን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3} and HDMI {port4} ports support Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2}፣ HDMI {port3} እና HDMI {port4} ወደቦች የ Ultra HD Deep Color ን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: Note : If your device does not support this feature, it may not work properly. In that case, you can connect the device to a different HDMI port or turn the 8K HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color setting off.
segment.target: ማስታወሻ: መሳሪያዎ ይህንን ባህሪ የማይደግፍ ከሆነ በትክክል ላይሰራ ይችላል። በዚያ ጊዜ፣ መሳሪያውን ከሌላ HDMI ወደብ ወይም የ 8K HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color ቀለም ቅንብሮችን ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1} port support 8K Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} ወደብ የ 8K Ultra HD Deep Color ቀለም ን ይደግፋል።

segment.source: HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support 8K Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1} እና HDMI {port2} ወደቦች የ 8K Ultra HD Deep Color ቀለም ን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2} and HDMI {port3} ports support 8K Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2} እና HDMI {port3} ወደቦች የ 8K Ultra HD Deep Color ቀለም ን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: HDMI {port1}, HDMI {port2}, HDMI {port3} and HDMI {port4} ports support 8K Ultra HD Deep Color.
segment.target: HDMI {port1}፣ HDMI {port2}፣ HDMI {port3} እና HDMI {port4} ወደቦች የ 8K Ultra HD Deep Color ቀለምን ይደግፋሉ።

segment.source: You can select the Ultra HD Deep Color of port.
segment.target: Ultra HD Deep Color ወደብን መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: You can launch the Instant Game Response by setting HDMI Ultra HD Deep Color 'On'.
segment.target: HDMI Ultra HD Deep Colorን “አብራ” የሚለዉን በመንካት ፈጣን የጨዋታ ምላሽ ማስጀመር ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Select the Ultra HD Deep Color for HDMI {num} port.
segment.target: ለ HDMI {num} ወደብ የ Ultra HD Deep Color ይምረጡ።

segment.source: * This mode expresses the Filmmaker's intentions clearly but may look darker than other picture modes.
segment.target: * ይህ ሁነታ የ FILMMAKER MODEን ዓላማን በግልጹ ቢያብራራም ከ ሌሎች ምስል ሁነታዎች ይልቅ ጠቁሮ ይታያል።

segment.source: Automatically change to Filmmaker mode when movie content is recognized.
segment.target: የፊልሙ ይዘት ሲታወቅ፣ በራስ ሰር መንገድ ወደ FILMMAKER MODE ቀይር።

segment.source: If it's turned on and you connect a device that also supports Ultra HD Deep Color, your picture may be clearer.
segment.target: ይህንን ቢያበሩት እና Ultra HD Deep Colorን የሚደግፍ መሳሪያ ቢያገናኙ፣ ምስልዎ የበለጠ ጥራት ሊኖረው ይችላል።

segment.source: Please check that the Bluetooth device is already connected to another device.
segment.target: የBluetooth መሣሪያ አስቀድሞ ከሌላ መሣሪያ ጋር የተገናኘ መሆኑን ያረጋግጡ።

segment.source: 1) Turn the Bluetooth on the other device off.
segment.target: 1) በሌላው መሳያ ላይ ያለውን Bluetoothን አጥፋ።

segment.source: 2) Turn the Bluetooth device to connect off and on.
segment.target: 2) ለማገናኘት የBluetooth መሣሪያውን ያጥፉ እና ያብሩ።

segment.source: Bluetooth Surround Sound + Internal TV Speaker
segment.target: የ Bluetooth ሰራውንድ ድምጽ + ውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር

segment.source: The setting of Bluetooth Surround Sound + Internal TV Speaker will be reset.
segment.target: በ Bluetooth የሰራውንድ ድምጽ + የውስጣዊ TV ስፒከር ቅንብር ዳግም ይጀምራል።

segment.source: Select the Sound mode for each content type.
segment.target: ለእያንዳንዱ የይዘት ዓይነት የድምጽ ሁነታን ምረጥ።

segment.source: Select the Sound mode and set detailed Audio effects.
segment.target: የድምጽ ሁነታን ምረጥ እና ዝርዝር የድምጽ ትጽዕኖን አዋቅር።

segment.source: It provides the optimal sound or Virtual 5.1 surround depending on the watching genre by an algorithm learned via a LG Deep Learning technique.
segment.target: በLG የጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም ዘውግን ለመመልከት የተባ ድምጽ ወይም ልከኛ ምናባዊ 5.1 ሰራውንድ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: Enhance the resolution and sharpness of contents by an algorithm learned via a LG Deep Learning technique and optimize a depth through contents analysis.
segment.target: የይዘቶችን ጥራት እና ልካዊነት በLG ጥልቅ የመማሪያ ቴክኒክ የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም.ያጎልብቱ እናም በይዘቶች ትንተና የጥልቀትን መጠን ያትቡ።

segment.source: Optimize a depth for contents by an algorithm learned via a LG Machine Leaning technique.
segment.target: የይዘትዎን የጥልቀት መጠን ከ LG የማሽን መማሪያ ቴክኒክ በተገኘ አልጎሪዝም ያትቡ።

segment.source: Automatically adjust to a picture value optimized for contents genre.
segment.target: ለተባ የይዘቶችን ዘውግ ወደ የተባ የምስል እሴት በራስ ሰር ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Automatically adjust to a picture value optimized for Dolby HDR contents genre.
segment.target: ለተባ የDolby HDR ይዘቶች ዘውግ ወደ የተባ የምስል እሴት በራስ ሰር ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: It provides the optimal sound or Virtual 4.0 surround depending on the watching genre by an algorithm learned via a LG Machine Leaning technique.
segment.target: በ LG የጥልቅ መማር ቴክኒክ በኩል የተገኘ አልጎሪዝም ዘውግን ለመመልከት የተባ ድምጽን ወይም ልከኛ ምናባዊ 4.0 ሰራውንድ ያቀርባል።

segment.source: Activating this toggle will cause LGE to instruct its third party providers to cease commercializing your personal information. Unless you separately opt out, you can still access services like Live Plus, LG Channels, and Who.Where.What?.
segment.target: ይህንን መቀየሪያ ማብራት የLGEን የ ሶስተኛ ወገን ተጠቃሚዎችን የግል መረጃዎትን ንግዳዊ ከማድረግ ክልከላ ያደርጋል። ለብቻ ካልመረጡ በቀር እንደ Live Plus፣ LG Channels፣ እና Who.Where.What? ያሉትን አገልግሎቶችን መጠቀም ይችላሉ።

segment.source: * This mode expresses the FILMMAKER MODE's intentions clearly but may look darker than other picture modes.
segment.target: * ይህ ሁነታ የ FILMMAKER MODEን ዓላማን በግልጹ ቢያብራራም ከ ሌሎች ምስል ሁነታዎች ይልቅ ጠቁሮ ይታያል።

segment.source: Automatically change to FILMMAKER MODE when movie content is recognized.
segment.target: የፊልሙ ይዘት ሲታወቅ፣ በራስ ሰር መንገድ ወደ FILMMAKER MODE ቀይር።

segment.source: Also, you can adjust the detail setting of Bluetooth Surround sound directly.
segment.target: እንዲሁም የ Bluetooth ከባቢ ድምፅን ዝርዝር ቅንብርን በቀጥታ ማስተካከልም ይችላሉ።

segment.source: Connect Bluetooth speaker and TV speaker and automatically adjust the Audio Delay between speakers.
segment.target: የ Bluetooth ስፒከር እና TV ስፒከር ያገናኙ እና በስፒከሮች መካከል ያለውን Audio Delay ወዲያውኑ ያስተካክሉ።

segment.source: Describe the contents on the screen with voice for visually impaired viewers to use TV.
segment.target: ማየት ለሚቸግራቸው ተመልካቾች ቲቪ ለመጠቀም ይዘቶቹን በድምጽ በማያ ገጹ ላይ ይግለጹ።

segment.source: Even if the setting is off, you can check the related information through channel banner, voice recognition.
segment.target: ቅንብሩ ቢጠፋ እንኳ፣ በጣቢያው ባነር፣ ድምፅ መለያ በኩል ተዛማጅ መረጃውን መፈተሽ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: When a device is connected to the port, the game image is optimized with minimal delays, cracking, or interruptions.
segment.target: መሳሪያ ወደ ማስገቢያው ሲገናኝ፣ የጨዋታ ምስሉ አነስተኛ መዘግየቶች፣ መሰነጣጠቅ ወይም መስተጓጎሎች ይስተካከላል።

segment.source: Set caption size, color, transparency, and other options for broadcasts.
segment.target: ለስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሁፍ መጠን፣ ቀለም፣ ብርሀን የማስተላለፍ ችሎታን እና ሌሎች አማራጮችን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Set caption size, color, transparency, and other options for NEXTGEN TV broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ NEXTGEN TV ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሁፍ መጠን፣ ቀለም፣ ብርሀን የማስተላለፍ ችሎታን እና ሌሎች አማራጮችን ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Select a caption type for NEXTGEN TV broadcasts.
segment.target: ለ NEXTGEN TV ስርጭቶች የመግለጫ ጽሑፍ ዓይነት ይምረጡ።

segment.source: Set the TV to turn off automatically if there is no user input for 4 hours after the TV automatically turns on.
segment.target: ቲቪውን በራሱ ጊዜ ከበራ በኋላ ለ 4 ሰዓታት ምንም የተጠቃሚ ግብአት ከሌለ ቲቪውን በራሱ ጊዜ ለማጥፋት ያዘጋጁ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support AMD FreeSync Premium, and you can select this function.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} እና HDMI {port2} ማስገቢያዎች AMD FreeSync Premium ይደግፋሉ እና ይህን ተግባር መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} and HDMI {port2} ports support AMD FreeSync Premium, and you can turn it on or off.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} እና HDMI {port2} ማስገቢያዎች AMD FreeSync Premium ይደግፋሉ እና ማብራት ወይም ማጥፋት ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} port supports AMD FreeSync Premium, and you can select this function.
segment.target: የ HDMI {port1} ማስገቢያ AMD FreeSync Premium ይደግፋል እና ይህን ተግባር መምረጥ ይችላሉ።

segment.source: The HDMI {port1} port supports AMD FreeSync Premium, and you can turn it on or off.

segment.source: By pressing "Reset", a new AD ID will be assigned to your Smart TV and ad-related data will be collected and tracked based on this new AD ID.
segment.target: “ዳግም አስጀምር” የሚለውን በመጫን አዲስ AD ID ለእርስዎ Smart TV ይመደብለታል እና ከማስታወቂያ ጋር የተገናኘው መረጃ በዚህ አዲሱ AD ID መታወቂያ ላይ በመመርኮዝ ይሰበሰብ እና ክትትል ይደረግበታል ፡፡

segment.source: Activating this option will stop tracking of ad-related personal data from this Smart TV. Turning on the toggle may impact the types of ads you see going forward, but it will not stop you from receiving ads.
segment.target: ይህንን አማራጭ ማስጀመር ከዚህ Smart TV ከማስታወቂያ ጋር የተዛመዱ የግል መረጃዎችን ክትትል ያስቆማል። መቀየሪያን ማብራት ወደፊት የሚመለከቱዋቸውን የማስታወቂያ አይነቶች ላይ ተጽዕኖ ሊኖረው ይችላል ነገር ግን ማስታወቂያዎችን ከመቀበል አያግደዎትም።

segment.source: Activating this toggle will cause LGE to instruct its third party providers to cease commercializing your personal information. Please note that this toggle does not affect certain services operated by third parties who collect your personal information in accordance with their own privacy policies. Please read those policies regarding their collection and use of your personal information.
segment.target: ይህን መቀየሪያ ማሰጀመር ኤል.ጂ.ኢ LGE የሶስተኛ ወገን አቅራቢዎችን የግል መረጃዎን ማስታዋወቅ እንዲያቆም ያዛል። ይህ መቀየሪያ የእርስዎን የግል መረጃ በእራሳቸው የግላዊነት ፖሊሲዎች መሠረት የግል መረጃዎን በሚሰበስቡ በሶስተኛ ወገኖች የሚሰሩ የተወሰኑ አገልግሎቶችን እንደማይጎዳ እባክዎ ልብ ይበሉ ፡፡ እባክዎ የግል መረጃ አሰባሰብ እና አጠቃቀምን በተመለከተ እነዚህን መመሪያዎች ያንብቡ ፡፡
